title: Mafia and Secret Agent MF.
body:
Can we please lower the price of those skins to 750 tier?

It just a model update...they dont have new particles or a recall animation....I know they are really old, but they just did the update o,o they should consider the price of the skins when they do a rework....for example if a skin cost 975 and they are reworking a champion that skin should have a different recall animation or have one.

Same thing with Bloodlord Vlad...it cost 1820, and Soulstealer Vladimir cost 1350 and its a much better skin than Bloodlord because is new.

replies.body: All of {{champion:37}}'s skins but arcade and DJ have no new particle effects and only DJ has a recall. Would be nice if Riot gave her a recall animation and maybe a custom one for arcade.... nope, she just stands there.

I would like if all of her animations in general were more noticeable. She doesn't really do anything.

I like Leona's, Twitch's, and Jinx's because when I spam them it looks weird and is good to taunt the enemy with.
If she did anything but stand there it would be nice, but that would involve work..... riot's too busy with  random character redos.... ({{champion:114}}  cough cough)
